doc:
George Waggner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Waggner 0 George Waggner (September 7, 1894 – December 11, 1984) was an actor, director, producer and writer. He is best known for directing Lon Chaney Jr. in the 1941 film The Wolf Man. George_Waggner ( September_7_,_1894 – December_11_,_1984 ) was an_actor_,_director_,_producer_and_writer . He is_best_known for directing Lon_Chaney_Jr. in the_1941_film The_Wolf_Man .
